name: .19 (aug 31) WALL KILLER LOVE version. Lucky Lucy van Delft
description:
alt title - ME ALL HAPPY AFTER PAINTING A 3D DOOR IN THE VERMEER TUNNEL PROJECT.

this face is why painting will always have such an allure. if you look in the prep album, you can see the many door photographs taken around Delft to study. this was no willy nilly off-the-cuff painting. in my humble opinion, the doors turned out very realistic. yay! to continue the story, the reason i had to add doors in the first place is because vermeer's little street painting ended before the wall did. the rest is "imagined background" as authentic as possible.
_____________________________________________
medium - acrylic & aerosol paint
year - 2019
location - delft, nl
project - VISIONS OF JOHANNES (IF VERMEER WROTE GRAFFITI)
_____________________________________________

tune - lucky lucy the wall killer by ras om (audiotrimmer.com trimmed it)

love,
lucy
xxoo

"i did my best, gave a shit and found a gun in vermeer's view of delft."
